roleset.name: make noise like a little bell
roleset.note: JANGLE-V NOTES: Based on ULA written. Verbnet class sound_emission-43.2. No corresponding FN class. Frame by Claire. Updated 12/10. (from jangle.01-v)

role.descr: emitter of jangling sound, thing jangled

example.name: weird use of music as agent and bell tower as theme
example.text: Hard rock music jangles the minarets of Iran.
